alert.note: Alert for Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 21 at 2:38PM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches, locally up to 20 inches, possible. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This system will affect pre-Christmas travel days. If planning to travel during this period, take appropriate precautions and be prepared for winter mountain driving conditions, including snowpacked roads and poor visibility.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
